question: How does the evaluation procedure address the chatbot's ability to handle questions outside the scope of the course content?
response: The chatbot evaluation procedure includes assessing its ability to handle out-of-context questions, like "Who is the king of Spain?". This is evaluated as part of the "Precision" criteria, which measures how accurately the chatbot identifies and handles questions that are outside the defined scope of the NLP and LLM 2024/2025 course.
